mapper.insert: INSERT INTO 請求.請求 (請求ID, 請求番号, 請求日, 顧客ID, 受注年月) VALUES ( #{invoiceId}, #{invoiceNumber.value}, #{invoiceDate.value}, #{customerId.value}, #{orderedYearMonth.value} )
INSERT INTO 請求.請求済受注(請求ID, 受注ID) VALUES (#{invoiceId}, #{salesOrder.salesOrderId.value})
mapper.select: SELECT 請求.請求ID AS "invoiceId.value", 請求.請求番号 AS "invoiceNumber.value", 請求.請求日 AS "invoiceDate.value", 請求.受注年月 AS "orderedYearMonth.value", 顧客.顧客ID AS "customerId.value", 顧客.顧客姓 AS "customerName.lastName", 顧客.顧客名 AS "customerName.firstName", '請求済' AS "invoiceStatus" FROM 請求.請求 INNER JOIN 請求.請求済受注 ON 請求.請求ID = 請求済受注.請求ID INNER JOIN 顧客.顧客 ON 請求.顧客ID = 顧客.顧客ID INNER JOIN 受注.受注 ON 請求済受注.受注ID = 受注.受注ID

SELECT 顧客.顧客ID AS "customerId.value", 顧客.顧客姓 AS "customerName.lastName", 顧客.顧客名 AS "customerName.firstName", date_trunc('month', 受注.受注日)::date AS "orderedYearMonth.value", '未請求' AS "invoiceStatus" FROM 出荷指示.出荷済 INNER JOIN 出荷指示.出荷指示 ON 出荷指示.出荷番号 = 出荷済.出荷番号 INNER JOIN 受注.受注 ON 出荷指示.受注ID = 受注.受注ID INNER JOIN 顧客.顧客 ON 受注.顧客ID = 顧客.顧客ID GROUP BY 顧客.顧客ID, "orderedYearMonth.value"

SELECT 請求.請求ID AS "invoiceId.value", 請求.請求番号 AS "invoiceNumber.value", 請求.請求日 AS "invoiceDate.value", 請求.受注年月 AS "orderedYearMonth.value", 顧客.顧客ID AS "customer.customerId.value", 顧客.顧客姓 AS "customer.customerName.lastName", 顧客.顧客名 AS "customer.customerName.firstName" FROM 請求.請求 INNER JOIN 請求.請求済受注 ON 請求.請求ID = 請求済受注.請求ID INNER JOIN 顧客.顧客 ON 請求.顧客ID = 顧客.顧客ID INNER JOIN 受注.受注 ON 請求済受注.受注ID = 受注.受注ID WHERE 請求.請求ID = #{invoiceId.value}
SELECT 受注.受注ID AS "value" FROM 請求.請求 INNER JOIN 請求.請求済受注 ON 請求.請求ID = 請求済受注.請求ID INNER JOIN 受注.受注 ON 請求済受注.受注ID = 受注.受注ID WHERE 請求.請求ID = #{invoiceId.value}
